results.abstract: former US astronaut W Schirra article holds astronauts accomplished goal of proving that men can exist in space station for more than 3 wks; contends malfunction in spacecraft's environmental control system is most probable reason for accident; scores elements of US soc that hold US should curtail or abandon space program because of such tragedies
results.snippet: Three men returned from earth orbit on June 30 with a new endurance record. The machine Soyuz 11 obediently and carefully deposited its cargo in sight of the recovery helicopter. The joyous back-slapping reunion with their compatriots was denied this...
results.lead_paragraph: Three men returned from earth orbit on June 30 with a new endurance record. The machine Soyuz 11 obediently and carefully deposited its cargo in sight of the recovery helicopter. The joyous back-slapping reunion with their compatriots was denied this crew. Lieut. Col. Georgi T. Dobrovolsky, Viktor I. Patsayev and Vladislav N. Volkov perished during the re-entry maneuver.
